thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: JOE Quezada

author: JOE Quezada
title: JOE Quezada
text:
I have purchased from both the Ebay store and its dedicated web page, I've recieved the best service and best quality consistent products time after time. I will always use mycomicshop for all my comic needs, great condition packing, mailing, and fair market pricing, all of my purchases have been 100% as described, a rare trait in online comic transactions. Thanks for your attention to quality.
Respectfully,
Sgt. J. T. Quezada( U.S.A. Ret.)
